name: Darklicious Reddit - Rewritten (less dark)
description:
BEFORE, INSTALL "Darklicious Reddit - Rewritten" IN ADDITION FOR THIS CSS TO WORK PROPERLY.


"Darklicious Reddit - Rewritten" is very good but it's too dark. I didn't code it, it's not mine. If it's a problem that I'm adding things to it please contact me. I just made it for myself at the beginning.


This CSS doesn't include the "Darklicious Reddit - Rewritten" code. It just overrides some code so I don't have to modify this css if "Darklicious Reddit - Rewritten" is updated.

Darklicious Reddit - Rewritten : https://userstyles.org/styles/22801/darklicious-reddit-rewritten
additional_info:
v0.1
- background less dark

v0.2
- titles color more white

v0.3
- links color and opacity (share, report...) less dark

v0.4
- added a border on the expand buttons for image, video or text (the buttons are more visible)

v0.5
- a left marg (not sure about this, I'm testing - you can change it easily in the code, it was 5px by default). It just works on some sub reddits.

v0.6
- search field more white
- info advanced search darker
